sentences.en: Every movement showed a massive, slumbrous strength , and a stupidity which held them in subjection.
sentences.cn: 每一次一动都显得困难重重,试图使这些马匹顺从的努力看起来也愚不可及.

sentences.en: Forcible subjection of Aborigines to police rule.
sentences.cn: 五.对原住民族实施强制性的[警察统治]暴力.

sentences.en: It is impossible nowadays to keep nations in subjection if they are striving for freedom.
sentences.cn: 当今,只要各民族为自由而奋斗,就不可能使他们屈服.

sentences.en: She revolved the'son Willoughby " through moods of stupefaction, contempt, revolt, subjection.
sentences.cn: 她以麻木 、 鄙夷 、 厌恶 、 屈从的心情反复默想着 “ 我的孩子威洛比 ”.

sentences.en: The nation was kept in subjection.
sentences.cn: 这个民族已经沦为附庸.

sentences.en: This paper points out some defects of Chinese Classification - Subjection Words List and suggests some improvements.
sentences.cn: 本文指出了《中国分类主题词表》的一些优缺点,并提出了一些改进意见.

sentences.en: Thou hast put all things in subjection under his feet.

words.tran_cn: 服从的；易患…的；受制于…的
主题；科目；[语] 主语；国民

trans.tran_en: when a person or a group of people are controlled by a government or by another person
